clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in soft tissue of thigh with SUVmax 10.64.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Mild inflammatory uptake in soft tissue of thigh region.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
recommendations: Consider lab tests to assess metabolic activity if indicated.
